ed32648d-0944-4640-b531-209d58d75248.description: Earners of the 5G Leadership Skills Certification have participated in nineteen 5G Leadership Skills Workshops. These workshops represent the top interpersonal and leadership skills that industry has cited as being critical for the next generation of leaders to possess. 5G Leadership workshops provide dynamic collaborative learning environments, both facilitated and flipped, blended online formats.
ed32648d-0944-4640-b531-209d58d75248.name: 5G Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of all 19 workshops divided into three sections: Collaborative Environment, Building Connections and Purposeful Leadership. In the Collaborative Environment Training section, a strong understanding is gained of how; Generational Intelligence, Inclusive Diversity, Personal Brand, 360 Degree Mentoring and Organizational Culture when combined with Emotional Intelligence can be used to strengthen the collaborative relationships that drive the successful workplace.

In the Building Connections Training Section, leaders use principles of Winning Mindset, Resilience and Adaptability while they personalize Boundaries and Balance and gain fluency in verbal, written and non-verbal communication to maximize their leadership brand.

In the Purposeful Leadership Training Section, skills are applied in areas like Business Ethics, Conflict Resolution, Motivation, and Productivity to equip Dynamic Leaders for the workplace today, no matter what level job they currently hold.

36e54a2d-0ba3-4466-9dd7-8071271950b0.description: Earners of the 5G Mastery Certification have participated in twenty-five 5G Power Skills workshops. These workshops represent the top 25 interpersonal skills that industry is citing as a critical need in the workforce today. Each workshop is a facilitated discussion. Adults learn best from other adults and 5G is a dynamic collaborative learning environment using large and small group discussion and exercise with focus on how to bring these skills into daily use in their professional lives.
36e54a2d-0ba3-4466-9dd7-8071271950b0.name: 5G Mastery Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all 25 5G Power Skills Workshops, Address diversity by understanding how differing world view impact relationships, Develop personal brand, Investigate the power of diversity in teamwork, Discuss the importance of ethical behavior in the workplace and the consequences of unethical behavior, Consider impact of mindset on long term outcomes, both personally and organizationally, Examine emotional intelligence and understand personal strengths and weaknesses

Explore current best practices in verbal, written, and non-verbal communication and understand how to best employ each in different situations, Understand the importance of mentoring to long term career growth, Establish appropriate etiquette in today’s workplace including the use of personal technology in group environments, Practice conflict resolution best approaches and understand how to deal with conflict in the work environment

Promote resilience and adaptability and understand how it improves personal and professional outcomes, Develop effective boundary and time management skills, Define the characteristics of good leadership, Reflect on how the cumulative set of Power Skills ultimately benefits customer experience

4ce38744-5fb4-4924-9937-2deb64e1f551.description: Earners of the 5G Certified Facilitator badge have completed the requirements of 5GC™ and have been invited to join the ranks of Alpha UMi's 5G Certified Facilitators by demonstrating superior skills in engaging groups in collaborative learning, facilitating discussions, and mastery of the subject material.
4ce38744-5fb4-4924-9937-2deb64e1f551.name: 5G Certified Facilitator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the 5G Mastery Certification
Complete Alpha UMi's Train-the-Trainer course
Successfully facilitate 5G workshop
Recognized as a 5GC Facilitator (invitation-only)
Licensed through an organization to provide 5GC Power Skills workshops

8756647b-7010-4ca9-9f6d-3d2a9b6000c8.description: Earners of the 5G® Coaching Skills Mastery Certification have participated in the 5G Coaching Skills workshops. This program improves student engagement and retention in higher education. These workshops contrast the differences between traditional advising and student success coaching to guide students into developing their own goals and establishing the path to achievement. Building a sense of ownership within a student will provide them the motivation to stay the course to goal completion.
8756647b-7010-4ca9-9f6d-3d2a9b6000c8.name: 5G Mastery Coaching Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all 5G Coaching Skills Workshops, Address diversity by understanding how differing world view impact relationships, Investigate the power of diversity in coaching,  Consider impact of mindset on long term outcomes, both personally and for student success, Examine emotional intelligence for reading the student.  Understand the barrriers to student success.  Review the demographics of students in your college.

Collaborate with other faculty and staff to share experiences. Build a description of Student Success Coaching relevant to your ogranization. Explore current best practices in communication and understand how to best employ each in different situations,  Practice de-escalating the conflict best approaches and understand how to deal with conflict in the educational environment

Develop your own ethical duidelines for being a Student Success Coach, Eplore the value of student coaching from the perspective of your college, your own position, and that of the student. Consider the value of helping students set goals and establish a sense of purpose.  Reflect on how the cumulative set of Coaching Skills ultimately benefits the student experience

473504f5-0fe2-411e-845d-13768101526f.name: 5G Power Skills for College Professionals

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of all 12 workshops divided into four sections: Diversity & Collaboration, Interpersonal Communication, Adaptive Thinking, and Professional Leadership. In the Collaborative Environment Training section, a strong understanding is gained of how; World Views, Inclusive Workplaces, and Organizational Culture when combined can be used to strengthen the collaborative relationships that drive the successful workplace.
In the Interpersonal Communication section, leaders gain fluency in verbal, written and non-verbal communications, to maximize their leadership brand.
In the Adaptive Thinking section, skills are applied in the areas of Emotional Intelligence, the Power of Outlook, and creating your own unique Personal Brand.
In the Professional Leadership section, skills in Conflict Resolution, Integrity and Productivity are explored to equip leaders for the workplace today, no matter what job they currently hold.
